text: ToddWorld is an American animated children's television series created by Todd Parr and Gerry Renert through their Californian production company SupperTime Entertainment. The series was produced by Mike Young Productions. ==Broadcast== The series aired on TLC and Discovery Kids in the United States, CBeebies in the United Kingdom, and ABC Kids in Australia. The series continued to air on TLC until 2007 and Discovery Kids until 2008, and now airs on Kabillion and Ultra Kidz. ==Home media== Some are releases with DVD and VHS to distribute HIT Entertainment: * Hi, I'm Todd! and Todd's Best Friends (April 5, 2005) * Come Over to my House (August 23, 2005) * Platyroo and Family, Too!
